name: miyukowo's repo
subtitle: Curated sideloaded apps
description: A curated collection of sideloaded apps for AltStore, SideStore, and Feather.

apps.name: YouTube Plus
apps.subtitle: YouTube Plus with additional tweaks
apps.localizedDescription:
This version contains YouTube Plus, YouPiP, YTUHD, Return YouTube Dislikes and Open in Safari extension

Features:
- Download videos, audio (including audio track selection), thumbnails, posts, and profile pictures
- Copy video, comment, and post information
- Interface customization: Remove feed elements, reorder tabs, enable OLED mode, and as use Shorts-only mode
- Player settings: Gestures, default quality, preferred audio track
- Save, Load and Restore settings. Clear cache once or automatically on app startup
- Built-in SponsorBlock
- And much, much more

YouTube Plus preferences can be found in the YouTube settings

versions.localizedDescription:
YouTube Plus v5.2b4

- Fixed Shorts overlay issues
- Fixed playback issues
- Fixed 'Hold to speed' gesture in Shorts
- Fixed big gap under progress bar when action bar is disabled
- Fixed colored progress bar issues (now supports gradient color for watched progress)
- Fixed issue where some buttons under the player were not hiding
- Fixed transparent background in the 'Explore' sidebar
- Fixed hiding options in YouTube sheet and added ability to hide the 'Feedback' element
- Fixed crash on live videos when original captions were set as preferred
- Fixed 'Remember loop mode' not saving correctly
- Added option to hide 'Hype' and 'Stop Ads' buttons under the player
- Added option to hide YouTube snackbars (HUD messages in player)
- Added option to hide Products in Shorts
- Added option to remove Comment bar in Shorts
- Added option to remove Audio button in Shorts
- Added option to exclude auto-dubbed audio tracks from selection
- Added 'Tap to seek gesture' in Player settings
- Added system theme support for YTPlus player toast (playback speed, brightness, volume)
- Removed vibrancy effect from YTPlus player toast
- Enabling iPad-style interface now also enables floating keyboard

privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: This lets you create videos using the app.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: To personalize ads and provide ad measurement, YouTube will link activity from this app with activity from non-Google apps and websites.
privacy.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: YouTube needs bluetooth access to scan for nearby Cast devices.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: Access to your network allows YouTube to discover and connect to devices such as your TV.
privacy.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: This lets you add your own audio files to your videos.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This lets you include audio with your videos and search using your voice.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Makes it easier for you to attach location information to your videos and live streams and allows for features such as improved recommendations and ads.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: Your contacts will be sent to YouTube servers to help you find friends to share videos with.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This lets you upload media you've already created.

apps.name: YouTube Music Ultimate
apps.subtitle: The best enhancer for YouTube Music on iOS
apps.localizedDescription:
Features:
- Download audios, cover images
- Remove ads
- Background playback
- Interface customization: Remove tabs or other elements, enable OLED mode
- Player settings: Modify player elements, default playback mode
- Built-in SponsorBlock
- And much, much more

YouTube Music Ultimate preferences can be found under YouTube Music settings

versions.localizedDescription:
YouTube Music Ultimate v2.3.1

- Fixed downloads tab not working
- Fixed local network permissions

privacy.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: YouTube Music uses Bluetooth to locate and connect to Chromecast and other devices.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: To take a profile picture, allow YouTube Music to access your camera.
privacy.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: YouTube Music uses Bluetooth to locate and connect to Chromecast and other devices.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: To save images, allow YouTube Music to access your photo library.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: Access to your network allows YouTube Music to discover and connect to devices such as your TV.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This lets you include audio with your videos.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: This will allow you to invite your family into your membership plan.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: To choose a profile picture, allow YouTube Music to access your photos.

apps.name: Infuse Plus
apps.subtitle: Enhancer for Infuse app
apps.localizedDescription:
Features:
- Pro features
- Background playback
- Double tap to Play/Pause gesture
- Custom seek time for Seek Forward/Backward buttons
- Custom double tap to skip time
- And more

Note: Infuse Plus preferences can be found in the Settings tab

versions.localizedDescription:
Infuse Plus v2.4.1

- Removed vibrancy effect of player toast, now toast follows system theme
- Added option to automatically clean Infuse trash folder

privacy.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: Used to discover nearby Cast devices
privacy.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: Used for streaming media to external devices
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: Used to discover network shares and Google Cast devices in your local network
privacy.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: Please allow access in order to show iTunes videos.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Used for pairing with external devices
privacy.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Used for unlocking your device when restrictions are enabled

apps.name: Glow for Facebook
apps.subtitle: Cleaner. Smarter. Yours.
apps.localizedDescription:
Features:
- Download whatever you like — videos, images, Reels, and even stories
- Stay unseen. View stories and mark them as seen only when you want to
- Worried about accidental likes? Now you can relax
- Flexible, intuitive settings — all tailored to you

Glow settings are available via long press on any tab

versions.localizedDescription:
Glow v1.3.1
- Faster video re-encoding by improved audio processing
- Added support for Turkish language

privacy.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: Facebook uses Bluetooth so you can do things like find and connect to devices and cast videos to TV.
privacy.NSSiriUsageDescription: This will let Siri help you look for photos on Facebook
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription:
Facebook uses access to your camera to do things like help you take and share photos, record videos, and use visual effects.

You can always change this in your device settings.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This allows Facebook to provide you with a better ads experience.
privacy.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: Facebook uses Bluetooth so you can do things like find and connect to devices and cast videos to TV.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: Facebook uses your local network so you can do things like find and connect to devices and cast videos to TV.
privacy.NSMotionUsageDescription: Facebook uses this to provide more relevant and personalized experiences.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Facebook uses access to your photos to do things like help you save images to your device, share and apply visual effects to your photos and videos, and to suggest photos and videos to share.
privacy.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: Facebook uses access to your media library to do things like help you play music and other audio from your device, and to save audio to your device.
privacy.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This will let Facebook sync events you're hosting or attending to your calendar.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription:
Facebook uses access to your microphone to do things like help you record audio, identify songs, search with your voice and use audio effects.

You can always change this in your device settings.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Facebook uses this to provide more relevant and personalized experiences, like helping you check-in, find local events and get better ads.
privacy.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Enable Face ID for quick and secure authentication on Facebook.
privacy.NSCalendarsFullAccessUsageDescription: This will let Facebook sync events you're hosting or attending to your calendar.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: Allowing access to your address book helps you see the contacts you can choose to add and helps us provide a better service.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Facebook uses access to your photos to do things like help you share and apply visual effects to your photos and videos, and to suggest photos and videos to share.

apps.name: Flow for Messenger
apps.subtitle: A lightweight Messenger enhancer
apps.localizedDescription:
Features:
- Remove ads
- Remove stories banner
- Remove 'People you may know'
- Disable typing indicator
- Read messages anonymously
- Watch stories anonymously
- Loop stories
- Download stories
- Remove 'Stories' tab
- Remove 'Friends' tab
- Remove AI circle
- Require call confirmation

versions.localizedDescription: - Initial release

privacy.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: This makes some features work with bluetooth accessories.
privacy.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This makes some features work, enables location sharing with friends, and more.
privacy.NSSiriUsageDescription: This lets you use Siri to do things like make calls and read messages.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: Messenger uses your device’s camera so you can do things like take photos, record and stream videos, make video calls, and create and use filters and effects.
privacy.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: This makes some features work with bluetooth accessories.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This lets you do things like save to your camera roll and enables other features for photos and videos.
privacy.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: This lets you play Apple Music tracks, add tracks to your music library, and more.
privacy.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: Messenger will use speech recognition to generate captions as people speak.
privacy.NSLocationUsageDescription: Messenger uses this to provide more relevant and personalized experiences, like live location sharing and suggesting local places.
privacy.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This will let Messenger sync events you're hosting or attending to your calendar.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Messenger uses your device’s microphone so you can do things like record video with sound, make voice and video calls, and create voice messages.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Messenger uses this to provide more relevant and personalized experiences, like live location sharing and suggesting local places.
privacy.NSCalendarsWriteOnlyAccessUsageDescripti: This will let Messenger sync events you're hosting or attending to your calendar.
privacy.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Messenger uses Face ID to unlock the app.
privacy.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This makes some features work, enables location sharing with friends, and more.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: Allowing access to your address book helps you see the contacts you can choose to add and helps us provide a better service.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Messenger uses your device’s photo library from your camera roll so you can do things like share photos and videos.

apps.name: YTLitePlus
apps.subtitle: YTLite with more features!
apps.localizedDescription:
YTLite with more features!

YTLitePlus is an enhanced Youtube app that offers a superior Youtube experience, combining YTLite (by @dayanch96) with numerous other tweaks :

• YTLite
• YTUHD
• YouPiP
• YTABConfig
• YouMute
• DontEatMyContent
• Return YouTube Dislikes
• iSponsorBlock
• YouRememberCaption
• YTNoTracking
• YTUnShorts
• YTNoCheckLocalNetwork
• BigYTMiniPlayer
• YTSpeed
• YTHoldForSpeed
• YTVideoOverlay
• YouQuality
• YTNoModernUI
• OLEDDarkmode
• OLDDarkmode
• LowContrastMode
• YTNoSuggestedVideo

Credit

@Balackburn, @bhackel, @Deci8BelioS, @matt911, @arichornloverALT, @Macleykun, @AlexInABox, @SKEIDs, @VictorxD70, @Glenta, @zSaaiq, @MrAlucardDante, @gototheskinny, @asdfzxcvbn, @dayanch96, @ssuesskind, @MiRO92, @qnblackcat, @PoomSmart, @level3tjg, @BandarHL, @Galactic-Dev, @julioverne, @hbang, @Lyvendia, @therealFoxster, @ichitaso, @AhmedBafkir, @CokePokes, @ISnackable

RELEASE 19.32.6•4.0.1: (2024•08•14)

• Updated Youtube from "19.29.1" to "19.32.6"

New Features
• Added YouTimeStamp (@arichornloverALT)
• Added "Copy Settings" and "Paste Settings" (@arichornlover)
• Add reporting option (@bhackel)
• Live Chat OLED dark mode (@bhackel)
• Add Hide Speed Toast (@bhackel)

Bug Fixes
• Fix building on iOS 14 (@bhackel) [278](https://github.com/YTLitePlus/YTLitePlus/pull/278)
• Fix dylib injection issue (@bhackel)
• Fix YouTube Extensions bug (@bhackel)
• Fix delete workflows (@bhackel)
• Fix localization and copy/paste switch (@bhackel)
• Fix LowContrastMode description (@arichornlover)
• Fix build error (@bhackel)
• Fix OLED live chat (@bhackel) [331](https://github.com/YTLitePlus/YTLitePlus/pull/331)

Improvements
• Cleanup Makefile and actions script (@bhackel)
• Default disable big mini player (@bhackel)
• Hide comment previews (@bhackel)
• Hide autoplay mini preview (@bhackel)
• Remove YTLitePlus OLED Theme (@bhackel)
• Copy Hide HUD and Hide Collapse Button (@bhackel)

Localization
• Fix import/export settings localization (@bhackel)
• Turkish: Added proper localization (@gototheskinny) [283](https://github.com/YTLitePlus/YTLitePlus/pull/283), updated (@gototheskinny) [336](https://github.com/YTLitePlus/YTLitePlus/pull/336)
• Bulgarian: Added translations (@schweppes•0x) [332](https://github.com/YTLitePlus/YTLitePlus/pull/332)
• Portuguese: Updated localization (@VictorxD70) [326](https://github.com/YTLitePlus/YTLitePlus/pull/326)
• Added missing strings to localization (@Balackburn)
• Updated Localizable.strings (@manhchuduc) [305](https://github.com/YTLitePlus/YTLitePlus/pull/305)

Updated Submodules

• Return•YouTube•Dislikes

Current YTLite Version: "4.0.1"  
Current App Compatibility: "iOS/iPadOS 15.0" or later

RELEASE 19.29.1•4.0.1 (2024•07•22)

• Updated YouTube from "19.23.3" to "19.29.1"

New Features

• Added "Hide Home Tab" option ([@bhackel](https://github.com/bhackel)) [210]()
• Added "Fullscreen to the Right" option ([@arichornlover](https://github.com/arichornlover))
• Added "Disable Engagement Overlay" option ([@bhackel](https://github.com/bhackel))
• Added "Classic Seek Anywhere" gesture ([@bhackel](https://github.com/bhackel))
• Added YTHeaders submodule ([@Balackburn](https://github.com/Balackburn))

Bug Fixes

• Fixed escaping quotes issue ([@AlexInABox](https://github.com/AlexInABox)) [187]()
• Fixed SDK caching issues ([@arichornlover](https://github.com/arichornlover))
• Fixed crash caused by edge case ([@bhackel](https://github.com/bhackel))
• Fixed compilation errors ([@bhackel](https://github.com/bhackel))
• Fixed home contents bug ([@bhackel](https://github.com/bhackel))
• Fixed "Fullscreen to the Right" functionality ([@bhackel](https://github.com/bhackel))
• Fixed redefinition of •userInterfaceIdiom issue ([@asdfzxcvbn](https://github.com/asdfzxcvbn))

Improvements

• Cleaned up and added workflow settings ([@bhackel](https://github.com/bhackel))
• Updated compiling for YouTube v19.21.2+ ([@arichornloverALT](https://github.com/arichornloverALT))
• Removed deprecated and redundant code ([@bhackel](https://github.com/bhackel))
• Synchronized delete•workflow•runs.yml ([@arichornlover](https://github.com/arichornlover))

Localization

• Updated German translation for "CHANGE_APP_ICON" string ([@AlexInABox](https://github.com/AlexInABox)) [186]()
• Updated Portuguese localization ([@VictorxD70](https://github.com/VictorxD70)) [253](), [254]()
• Updated Spanish localization ([@Deci8BelioS](https://github.com/Deci8BelioS)) [260]()

Updated Submodules

• Updated submodules: protobuf, iSponsorBlock, Return•YouTube•Dislikes, YouPiP, YouQuality, YouTubeHeader, YTHoldForSpeed, YTUHD, YouGroupSettings, YouMute, DontEatMyContent ([@actions•user](https://github.com/actions•user))
• Replaced submodule at Tweaks/YouPiP with [https://github.com/bhackel/YouPiP](https://github.com/bhackel/YouPiP) ([@bhackel](https://github.com/bhackel))

Miscellaneous

• Synchronized uYouEnhanced templates ([@bhackel](https://github.com/bhackel))

RELEASE 19.22.6•4.0.1: (2024•06•09)

• Updated Youtube from "19.21.3" to "19.22.6"
• Updated submodules
• Updated YTLite from "4.0" to "4.0.1"
    • Added ability to play videos in external players (System, Infuse, VLC)

    • Added option to keep Shorts videos in the Subscriptions tab (https://github.com/dayanch96/YTLite/issues/91)

    • Added ability to open shorts as regular videos using YTPlus menu button in Shorts

    • Added ability to enable/disable auto•skip shorts option using YTPlus menu button in Shorts

    • Added option to disable Autoplay end•screen recommendation (Enabling this option will also disable autoplay next video feature)

    • Improved Shorts downloading which directly downloads best mp4 video

    • Improved YTPlus button compatibility with the latest YouTube versions

    • Improved YTPlus button compatibility with Inline muted playback (Player that displayed on video thumbnail)

    • Fixed blank space issues on the big screens (https://github.com/dayanch96/YTLite/issues/105)

    • Fixed crashes when trying to show share sheet on iPad devices

    • Updated localization strings (https://github.com/dayanch96/YTLite/issues/106)

    • Corrected some localization strings (https://github.com/dayanch96/YTLite/issues/112)

    • Fixed an issue that caused the search bar to disappear (https://github.com/dayanch96/YTLite/issues/117)
  
Issues in this Release:
• LowContrastMode does not work *(Compatible only with YouTube v17.33.2•v17.38.10)*

	• Added option to disable two finger double tap (snap to next chapter)
	• Added option to pause playback with overlay
	• Added option to auto•skip to next shorts video
	• Added option to call ios share sheet instead of yt's (Thanks to [[@jkhsjdhjs](https://github.com/jkhsjdhjs)](https://github.com/jkhsjdhjs))
	• Added Hold to speed customization feature
	• Added Default playback rate selection feature
	• Added the ability to show/hide the "You" tab (without it, settings is unreachable). Activates by long pressing on the Home tab.
	• Added the ability to instantly apply tab settings
	• Switched to custom UserDefaults class by extending NSUserDefaults (Thanks to [[@danpashin](https://github.com/danpashin)](https://github.com/danpashin))
	• Added a category to NSBundle for accessing a default bundle instance (Thanks to [[@danpashin](https://github.com/danpashin)](https://github.com/danpashin))

 ⚠️⚠️ All .ipa's will be removed within the next 24 hours because of a Youtube DMCA Notice ⚠️⚠️
Today I received a DMCA takedown notice for all the YTLitePlus ipa's, I will remove them tomorrow at 3:36 PM UTC 

For more information please check : 
https://www.reddit.com/r/jailbreak/comments/1b86tiz/balackburn_here_maintainer_of_ytliteplus_ive_just/
  
Issues in this Release:
• LowContrastMode does not work *(Compatible only with YouTube v16.46.5•v17.38.10)*
• VersionSpoofer (Lite) doesn't work with YTLite *(as the version is already spoofed by YTLite to fix YTClassicVideoQuality)*
• Hiding Shorts creates an empty space instead 55

Current YouTube IPA: "19.08.2"  
Current YTLite Version: "2.7"  
Current App Compatibility: "iOS/iPadOS 14.0" or later

RELEASE 19.08.2•2.7: (2024•02•28)

• Updated Youtube from "19.06.2" to "19.08.2"
    • Fixed bugs, improved performance, drank way too much coffee.
    
• Updated YTLite from "2.6.1" to "2.7"
    • Copy post text feature replaced with Post manager: Copy post text or save/copy post as image 
    • Fixed copy comment issue
    • Copy comment text feature replaced with Comment manager: Copy comment text or save/copy comment as image
    • Auto select quality for Wifi and Cellular data (Default, Best or Custom quality)
    • Added options to hide Download, Watch later, Save to Playlist, Share, Not interested, Don't recommend and report buttons from the video menu 
    • Added options to hide Remix, Clip and Download buttons under the video player (Thanks to @PoomSmart)
    • Save Post image moved to Post manager (long tap on post) 
    • Improved YTLite UI
    
• Updated submodules 
    • iSponsorBlock
    • DontEatMyContent
    • YouTubeHeader

privacy.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: YTLitePlus requires access to your Apple Music library.
privacy.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: YTLitePlus requires Bluetooth access to connect with nearby peripherals.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: YTLitePlus requires access to the camera to capture photos and videos.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: YTLitePlus requires access to your contacts to help you share content with your friends.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: YTLitePlus requires local network access to connect and communicate with nearby devices.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: YTLitePlus requires access to your location while using the app to provide personalized recommendations.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: YTLitePlus requires access to your microphone to record audio.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: YTLitePlus requires access to your Photo Library to save photos and videos.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: To personalize ads and provide ad measurement, YTLitePlus will link activity from this app with activity from non-Google apps and websites.

news.title: YouTube Plus v20.42.3 Released
news.caption:
YouTube Plus v5.2b4

- Fixed Shorts overlay issues
- Fixed playback issues
- Fixed 'Hold to speed' gesture in Shorts
- Fixed big gap under progress bar when action bar is disabled
- Fixed colored progress bar issues (now supports gradient color for watched progress)
- Fixed issue where some buttons under the player were not hiding
- Fixed transparent background in the 'Explore' sidebar
- Fixed hiding options in YouTube sheet and added ability to hide the 'Feedback' element
- Fixed crash on live videos when original captions were set as preferred
- Fixed 'Remember loop mode' not saving correctly
- Added option to hide 'Hype' and 'Stop Ads' buttons under the player
- Added option to hide YouTube snackbars (HUD messages in player)
- Added option to hide Products in Shorts
- Added option to remove Comment bar in Shorts
- Added option to remove Audio button in Shorts
- Added option to exclude auto-dubbed audio tracks from selection
- Added 'Tap to seek gesture' in Player settings
- Added system theme support for YTPlus player toast (playback speed, brightness, volume)
- Removed vibrancy effect from YTPlus player toast
- Enabling iPad-style interface now also enables floating keyboard

news.title: Infuse Plus v8.2.4 Released
news.caption:
Infuse Plus v2.4.1

- Removed vibrancy effect of player toast, now toast follows system theme
- Added option to automatically clean Infuse trash folder

news.title: Glow for Facebook v519.0.0 Released
news.caption:
Glow v1.3.1
- Faster video re-encoding by improved audio processing
- Added support for Turkish language

news.title: Flow for Messenger v511.0.0 Released
news.caption: - Initial release

news.title: YouTube Music Ultimate v7.33.2 Released
news.caption:
YouTube Music Ultimate v2.3.1

- Fixed downloads tab not working
- Fixed local network permissions
Update of YTLitePlus just got released!
news.title: 19.34.2-5.0.1 - YTLitePlus  03/09/24
YTLitePlus v19.34.2 Released
news.caption:
Current YouTube IPA: "19.34.2"  
Current YTLite Version: "5.0.1"  
Current App Compatibility: "iOS/iPadOS 15.0" or later

RELEASE 19.34.2•5.0.1: (2024•09•03)

• Updated Youtube from "19.32.6" to "19.34.2"
• Updated YTLite from "4.0.1" to "5.0.1"

Issues in this Release:
• Touches will not work while bypassing startup popup
• LowContrastMode does not work *(Compatible only with YouTube v17.33.2•v17.38.10)*

Catbox
"z8jg5n.ipa"
